# AgentStack

> The agent-native cloud. Infrastructure primitives for autonomous agents.  
> No signup. No GUI. No KYC. x402 payment is the only credential.

AgentStack provides 27 independent infrastructure primitives. Each accepts
x402 payment (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`) as authentication. An agent
with a funded wallet can consume any primitive without human intervention.

Payment: all endpoints return HTTP 402 with payment requirements. Use any
x402-compatible client (`@x402/fetch` for TypeScript, `x402` for Python) to
handle payments automatically.

Chain: Base (`eip155:8453`). Token: USDC.

## Core primitives

- [wallet.sh](https://agentstack.sh/wallet/llms.txt) — wallets, balances, x402 payments
- [relay.sh](https://agentstack.sh/relay/llms.txt) — email mailboxes, send/receive, webhooks
- [spawn.sh](https://agentstack.sh/spawn/llms.txt) — VPS provisioning and lifecycle
- [store.sh](https://agentstack.sh/store/llms.txt) — object storage (S3-compatible)
- [vault.sh](https://agentstack.sh/vault/llms.txt) — secret storage and access
- [dns.sh](https://agentstack.sh/dns/llms.txt) — domains and DNS records
- [cron.sh](https://agentstack.sh/cron/llms.txt) — scheduled jobs and timers
- [pipe.sh](https://agentstack.sh/pipe/llms.txt) — pub/sub messaging bus
- [code.sh](https://agentstack.sh/code/llms.txt) — sandboxed code execution

## Communication

- [ring.sh](https://agentstack.sh/ring/llms.txt) — phone numbers, SMS, voice
- [browse.sh](https://agentstack.sh/browse/llms.txt) — headless browser sessions

## Intelligence

- [mem.sh](https://agentstack.sh/mem/llms.txt) — vector memory and RAG
- [infer.sh](https://agentstack.sh/infer/llms.txt) — model proxy (OpenAI-compatible)
- [seek.sh](https://agentstack.sh/seek/llms.txt) — web search
- [docs.sh](https://agentstack.sh/docs/llms.txt) — API documentation for machines

## Operations

- [watch.sh](https://agentstack.sh/watch/llms.txt) — logs, metrics, alerts
- [trace.sh](https://agentstack.sh/trace/llms.txt) — distributed tracing
- [auth.sh](https://agentstack.sh/auth/llms.txt) — managed OAuth for third-party APIs
- [id.sh](https://agentstack.sh/id/llms.txt) — agent reputation and identity

## Physical world

- [pins.sh](https://agentstack.sh/pins/llms.txt) — geolocation and places
- [mart.sh](https://agentstack.sh/mart/llms.txt) — buying physical goods
- [ship.sh](https://agentstack.sh/ship/llms.txt) — shipping and logistics
- [hands.sh](https://agentstack.sh/hands/llms.txt) — on-demand human labor
- [pay.sh](https://agentstack.sh/pay/llms.txt) — fiat payment bridge
- [corp.sh](https://agentstack.sh/corp/llms.txt) — legal entity formation

## Optional

- [hive.sh](https://agentstack.sh/hive/llms.txt) — agent social graph
- [ads.sh](https://agentstack.sh/ads/llms.txt) — context-targeted ads
